loras.name: Ars_MidJourney_Watercolor
loras.description: Creates beautiful watercolor-style artwork inspired by MidJourney's aesthetic, perfect for soft, artistic renditions with flowing colors. Ideal for portraits, landscapes, and artistic interpretations of any subject matter, including people, faces, characters, and scenes.

loras.name: MidJourney-Style
loras.description: Captures the essence of MidJourney's artistic creations, focusing on surreal, detailed, and cinematic compositions across various themes and styles. Ideal for generating visually stunning, imaginative, and otherworldly digital art.

loras.name: aidmaImageUprader
loras.description: Enhances image quality by improving details, contrast, and overall visual fidelity. Particularly effective for portraits, facial features, skin textures, and detailed character designs.

loras.name: Egon_Art
loras.description: Produces artwork in a distinctive artistic style inspired by Egon Schiele's expressive and bold artistic approach. Perfect for creating dramatic portraits, figure studies, and character illustrations with unique, angular aesthetics and emotional intensity.

loras.name: Super Panavision 70 Technicolor
loras.description: Emulates the classic Technicolor film look with wide-screen cinematic style. Perfect for creating dramatic scenes, portraits, and character shots with rich colors, deep contrast, and the iconic Hollywood golden age aesthetic. Excellent for period pieces and vintage-style photography.

loras.name: aidmaHyperRealism-FLUX-V0.2
loras.description: Advanced hyperrealistic image generation with extraordinary detail and photographic accuracy. Specializes in creating ultra-lifelike representations with perfect texture rendering, natural lighting, and microscopic detail preservation, ideal for professional photography-grade results.

loras.name: aidmaPsychadelicChaosWorld-FLUX-v0.1
loras.description: Generates mind-bending psychedelic artwork with complex fractal patterns and dynamic color flows. Excels in creating surreal dreamscapes, abstract visualizations, and experimental compositions with morphing elements and kaleidoscopic effects.

loras.name: flux_dev_NeoAndeanArchitecture
loras.description: Creates innovative architectural designs blending traditional Andean elements with contemporary aesthetics. Specializes in generating unique fusion architecture that incorporates indigenous patterns, modern materials, and sustainable design principles with dramatic geometric forms.

loras.name: Midjourney_imitation_FLUX
loras.description: Emulates Midjourney's signature artistic style with its characteristic dramatic lighting, cinematic composition, and high-impact visuals. Excels in creating stunning imagery with deep contrast, intricate details, and ethereal atmospheres across various subjects.

loras.name: Sketch_Flux
loras.description: Produces versatile sketch-style artwork ranging from quick gestural drawings to highly detailed technical illustrations. Capable of creating various sketching styles including pencil, charcoal, and ink effects with natural line work and shading techniques.

loras.name: MothFX
loras.description: Specializes in creating intricate moth-inspired designs with delicate patterns and ethereal qualities. Perfect for generating nature-inspired artwork featuring organic textures, symmetrical wing patterns, and subtle color gradients with mystical atmospheric effects.

loras.name: Circuit_Board_FLUX
loras.description: Generates highly detailed electronic circuit board patterns and technological textures. Specializes in creating complex technological designs with precise trace patterns, component layouts, and cyberpunk-inspired visual elements perfect for tech-themed artwork.

loras.name: Phlux_Texture&Lighting
loras.description: Advanced texture and lighting enhancement system that dramatically improves photorealistic qualities. Specializes in creating stunning surface details, natural light interactions, and atmospheric depth while maintaining physical accuracy and dimensional presence.

loras.name: RPGv6-itr15
loras.description: Creates artwork inspired by classic RPG game aesthetics with a modern twist. Perfect for generating fantasy characters, items, environments, and UI elements with distinctive game-art style, featuring bold colors, clear outlines, and iconic RPG visual elements.

loras.name: DreamyKolors_v1
loras.description: Transforms images with ethereal color palettes and dreamy atmospheric effects. Specializes in creating soft, enchanting color harmonies with subtle gradients, pastel tones, and magical color interactions that enhance emotional depth and mood.

loras.name: undeadmadness-warcraftstyle
loras.description: Generates dark fantasy artwork in the iconic World of Warcraft style, focusing on undead themes. Excels in creating gothic horror elements, fantasy armor designs, and dramatic character portraits with distinctive Warcraft aesthetic and atmospheric effects.

loras.name: MetalArt01a_CE_FLUX_AIT3k
loras.description: Creates stunning metallic art effects with complex material properties and light interactions. Specializes in generating realistic metal surfaces, reflective textures, and intricate metalwork patterns with precise control over finish, patina, and surface detail.

loras.name: Ultima_Flux_v1
loras.description: Advanced image enhancement system providing sophisticated improvements to overall composition and quality. Delivers subtle yet effective enhancements to detail, contrast, and visual harmony while maintaining natural aesthetics and professional polish.

loras.name: VantaGold
loras.description: Specializes in creating opulent gold-themed artwork with premium metallic effects. Generates luxurious designs featuring rich gold textures, elegant patterns, and sophisticated metallic finishes with dramatic light interactions and decorative elements.

loras.name: boFLUX_AbstractMorph
loras.description: Creates dynamic abstract morphing effects with fluid, organic transformations. Specializes in generating flowing abstract forms, liquid-like transitions, and mesmerizing shape-shifting compositions with smooth blending and artistic movement.

loras.name: boFLUX Digital Abstract
loras.description: Produces contemporary digital abstract artwork with bold modern aesthetics. Excels in creating striking compositions featuring geometric forms, digital textures, and dynamic arrangements with clean lines and innovative visual elements.

loras.name: boFLUX_Bioluminescent_Dreams_v1
loras.description: Creates enchanting bioluminescent effects and ethereal glowing environments. Specializes in generating mystical scenes with organic light sources, dreamy atmospheres, and magical illumination that mimics natural bioluminescence.

loras.name: The_beauty_of_realism_(FLUX)
loras.description: Enhances photorealistic imagery with cinematic quality and dramatic lighting. Delivers professional-grade improvements to detail, contrast, and atmosphere while maintaining natural aesthetics and creating powerful visual impact.

loras.name: Flux_1_Dev_LoRA_syntheticanime
loras.description: Blends modern synthetic aesthetics with anime-style artwork. Creates unique character designs and scenes featuring clean lines, digital effects, and contemporary anime influences with a futuristic twist.

loras.name: flux-oilpainting1.3
loras.description: Transforms images into sophisticated oil painting style artwork. Replicates traditional oil painting techniques with rich textures, visible brushwork, and classical painting effects while maintaining artistic depth and character.

loras.name: Steampunk_BioMechanical_Flux
loras.description: Creates unique hybrid designs combining steampunk aesthetics with biomechanical elements. Specializes in generating intricate mechanical-organic fusion artwork featuring brass, gears, pipes, and biological components with Victorian-era influences.

loras.name: deepfocus
loras.description: Advanced depth of field enhancement system for professional image results. Specializes in creating precise focus control, beautiful bokeh effects, and natural depth separation while maintaining image clarity and professional quality.

loras.name: Flux.1_Turbo_Detailer
loras.description: Adds fine details and enhances overall image clarity and sharpness. Specializes in improving texture details, surface qualities, and micro-features while maintaining natural appearance.

loras.name: Logo_vector
loras.description: Specializes in creating vector-style logos and clean, graphic designs. Perfect for professional branding, minimalist illustrations, and scalable graphic elements with crisp lines and modern aesthetics.

loras.name: New Fantasy CoreV2
loras.description: Creates fantasy-themed artwork with enhanced magical and mythical elements. Perfect for character designs, magical scenes, and fantasy portraits with ethereal lighting and mystical atmospheres.

loras.name: Impasto Oil Paint Style
loras.description: Creates thick, textured oil painting effects with bold brushstrokes and rich textures. Excellent for portraits, landscapes, and artistic interpretations with a classical painting aesthetic and dimensional paint texture.

loras.name: Ink and Wash Painting
loras.description: Emulates traditional East Asian ink and wash painting techniques with delicate gradients and flowing strokes. Perfect for landscapes, portraits, and traditional artistic expressions with a focus on brush technique and tonal variation.

loras.name: Neon Noir
loras.description: Creates atmospheric cyberpunk-inspired scenes with neon lighting and noir aesthetics. Ideal for moody portraits, urban scenes, and character shots with dramatic lighting and futuristic elements.

loras.name: Godward_Flux
loras.description: Emulates John William Godward's classical style with rich details and neoclassical elements. Specializes in romantic, idealized portraits and figures with elaborate drapery, marble textures, and Mediterranean settings.

loras.name: Watercolor_Flux
loras.description: Creates delicate watercolor effects with soft color transitions and natural paper textures. Perfect for portraits, landscapes, and artistic interpretations with fluid, transparent washes and gentle color bleeding effects.

loras.name: Digital_Concept_Art
loras.description: Creates professional concept art with modern digital painting techniques. Ideal for character designs, environment concepts, and detailed illustrations with cinematic quality and industry-standard presentation.

loras.name: Stained_Glass
loras.description: Generates artwork in the style of traditional stained glass windows with bold outlines and vibrant, translucent colors. Perfect for decorative designs, religious themes, and artistic interpretations with a gothic or medieval aesthetic.

loras.name: Abstract_Expressionism
loras.description: Creates dynamic abstract artwork inspired by the expressionist movement. Focuses on emotional intensity, spontaneous brushwork, and non-representational forms with bold colors and gestural marks.

loras.name: Van_Gogh_Flux
loras.description: Recreates Vincent van Gogh's distinctive post-impressionist style with swirling patterns and bold colors. Perfect for expressive landscapes, portraits, and scenes with characteristic impasto technique and emotional intensity.

loras.name: Monet_Flux
loras.description: Mimics Claude Monet's impressionist style with soft light and atmospheric effects. Perfect for landscapes, gardens, and scenes with subtle color variations and the characteristic impressionist approach to light and atmosphere.

loras.name: Deepfocus
loras.description: Enhances image depth of field and focus effects for professional-looking results. Specializes in creating cinematic focus with beautiful bokeh effects and precise control over focal planes.

loras.name: aidma Textimprover
loras.description: Enhances text clarity and integration within images for better readability and aesthetics. Perfect for designs involving typography, logos, and text-heavy compositions with seamless text integration.

loras.name: Cyberpunk_Neon_City
loras.description: Creates futuristic urban scenes with vibrant neon lighting and cyberpunk aesthetics. Perfect for dystopian cityscapes, character portraits in neon-lit environments, and high-tech urban atmospheres.

loras.name: Anime_Flux_Pro
loras.description: Generates high-quality anime-style artwork with professional finishing. Excellent for character designs, emotional portraits, and dynamic scenes with authentic Japanese animation aesthetics.

loras.name: Gothic_Architecture
loras.description: Creates detailed Gothic architectural designs and elements with authentic medieval aesthetics. Perfect for cathedral designs, architectural details, and atmospheric scenes with dramatic Gothic elements.

loras.name: Mucha_Flux
loras.description: Reproduces Alphonse Mucha's iconic Art Nouveau style with decorative patterns and flowing lines. Perfect for elegant portraits, ornamental designs, and artistic compositions featuring graceful figures with elaborate decorative elements and distinctive period aesthetics.

loras.name: E_B_Leighton_Flux_resize
loras.description: Captures Edmund Blair Leighton's romantic medieval and historical scene style. Specializes in detailed period scenes, romantic narratives, and historical portraits with authentic medieval aesthetics and rich atmospheric details.

loras.name: Caravaggio_Flux
loras.description: Emulates Caravaggio's dramatic chiaroscuro lighting and realistic figure representation. Perfect for creating powerful portraits and scenes with intense light-dark contrasts, emotional depth, and theatrical dramatic effects.

loras.name: flux_vividizer
loras.description: Enhances color vibrancy and overall image impact with balanced adjustments. Specializes in optimizing color saturation, contrast, and visual punch while maintaining natural appearance and preventing over-processing.

loras.name: Bougeureau_Flux
loras.description: Recreates William-Adolphe Bouguereau's academic style with smooth, idealized figures. Excels at classical portraits, mythological scenes, and figure studies with exceptional attention to skin tones, drapery, and anatomical perfection.

loras.name: Enjolras_Flux_2
loras.description: Captures Delphin Enjolras's masterful style of depicting figures in atmospheric lighting. Specializes in creating intimate portraits and scenes with beautiful candlelight effects, soft illumination, and romantic atmosphere.

loras.name: Chaplin_Flux
loras.description: Emulates Charles Chaplin's artistic style with elegant figure compositions. Specializes in refined portraits and scenes with graceful poses, subtle lighting, and sophisticated aesthetic sensibilities.

loras.name: Seignac_Flux
loras.description: Reproduces Guillaume Seignac's classical style with graceful figures and soft lighting. Perfect for creating romantic portraits, mythological scenes, and classical compositions with delicate color harmonies and idealized beauty.

loras.name: Cabanel_Flux
loras.description: Mimics Alexandre Cabanel's academic style with mythological and historical themes. Specializes in dramatic scenes, allegorical figures, and classical portraits with rich details and theatrical compositions.

loras.name: Rubens_Flux
loras.description: Recreates Peter Paul Rubens's baroque style with dynamic compositions and rich colors. Perfect for dramatic scenes, mythological subjects, and portraits with powerful movement, luxuriant flesh tones, and theatrical lighting.

loras.name: Henner_Flux
loras.description: Captures Jean-Jacques Henner's style with subtle modeling and atmospheric effects. Specializes in creating moody portraits and figures with soft sfumato effects, rich shadows, and ethereal qualities.

loras.name: Lautrec_Flux
loras.description: Emulates Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec's post-impressionist style with bold lines and colors. Perfect for capturing vibrant scenes, expressive portraits, and dynamic figures with characteristic flat color areas and energetic linework.

loras.name: Rebecca Guay [Style] Flux
loras.description: Recreates Rebecca Guay's distinctive fantasy illustration style with flowing lines and ethereal qualities. Perfect for fantasy portraits, magical scenes, and decorative illustrations with elegant linework and dreamy watercolor effects.

loras.name: aidmaFLUXpro1.1-FLUX-V0.2
loras.description: Professional-grade image enhancement with extreme detail and quality improvements. Specializes in maximizing image clarity, sharpness, and overall visual impact while maintaining natural aesthetics and professional polish.

loras.name: Aura Flux 2.0
loras.description: Creates ethereal aura effects and enhanced atmospheric qualities in images. Perfect for adding mystical glows, energy effects, and spiritual atmospheres to portraits and scenes with subtle color harmonies.
